title: Michael Bennett Interview, Ex Files and More
itunes:title: Michael Bennett Interview, Ex Files and More
description:
Tuesday 6/13- Today on the show we had Michael Bennett the defensive end on Seattle Seahawks stop by, where he talked about Colin Kaepernick, using the n- word and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that threatened to kill multiple employees at a restaurant after they put onions in his food. Also, its Tuesday so we had our listeners call up to rant about their horrible ex on the Ex Files.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
